title: America’s Great Depression section IV
author: VD
content_html:
This is where I find things to start getting very interesting, because I think there are some areas where Rothbard’s assertions are, at a minimum, debatable. But keep in mind that the answers are based on the source material, not absolute truth as you understand it to be.

Chapter 4 next week. Economic contractions don’t take holidays.
content_text:
This is where I find things to start getting very interesting, because I think there are some areas where Rothbard’s assertions are, at a minimum, debatable.  But keep in mind that the answers are based on the source material, not absolute truth as you understand it to be.
Chapter 4 next week.  Economic contractions don’t take holidays.
